name: Weentown
description:
- Up to now, german language only -

Entkomme von einem mysteriösen Wasserschloss.

Ein kleines Point & Click Escape-Game, welches in einer #Townscaper-Stadt spielt.

Für ZFX Halloween Special 2021.

-----

Escape from a mysterious water castle.

A small point'n'click escape game playing in a #Townscaper city.

Made for ZFX Halloween Special 2021.
